field.label: Subnet
field.help: Subnet to use, should be large enough to hold the specified pools and reservations

field.label: Description
field.help: You may enter a description here for your reference (not parsed).

field.label: Pools
field.help: List of pools, one per line in range or subnet format (e.g. 192.168.0.100 - 192.168.0.200 , 192.0.2.64/26

field.label: Auto collect option data
field.help: Automatically update option data for relevant attributes as routers, dns servers and ntp servers when applying settings from the gui.

field.label: Routers (gateway)
field.help: Default gateways to offer to the clients

field.label: Static routes
field.help: Static routes that the client should install in its routing cache, defined as dest-ip1,router-ip1;dest-ip2,router-ip2

field.label: DNS servers
field.help: DNS servers to offer to the clients

field.label: Domain name
field.help: The domain name to offer to the client, set to this firewall's domain name when left empty

field.label: Domain search
field.help: Specifies a ´search list´ of Domain Names to be used by the client to locate not-fully-qualified domain names.

field.label: NTP servers
field.help: Specifies a list of IP addresses indicating NTP (RFC 5905) servers available to the client.

field.label: Time servers
field.help: Specifies a list of RFC 868 time servers available to the client.

field.label: x86 UEFI (32-bit) bootfile name
field.help: Boot filename to request for 32-bit x86 UEFI systems.

field.label: x64 UEFI/EBC (64-bit) bootfile name
field.help: Boot filename to request for 64-bit x64 UEFI/EBC systems.

field.label: Default bootfile name
field.help: Boot filename to request if no other boot file matches (e.g. legacy BIOS boot).
